definition.theta\_rule: Θ\_out \= Θ⁺ iff for every element in the domain, the predicate Box evaluates Θ⁺.
definition.sigma\_rule: Σ\_out aggregates all instances, e.g. infimum of instance supports.
definition.pi\_rule: Π\_out \= 1 iff Π\_pred(x) \= 1 for all x; otherwise 0 (or corresponding algebra).
